attributes.action: produce and publish a dossier detailing the illegal development of nuclear weapons in the Middle East by a repressive regime that poses such a threat to both the region and the wider world.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The illegal development and construction of nuclear weapons hasw been going on unchecked for decades at the facility in Dimona.  The posession of these and other weapons of mass destruction by a country that is well known for its internal repression, disregard of international human rights laws and many attacks upon other countries in the Middle East poses a grave threat to British interests within the region.

These actions should be condemned and its WMD programme destroyed by any and all necessary means.
